com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.cloud.analytics

Class AdvertisingNotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.cloud.analytics.AdvertisingNotificationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackgroundScanServiceConsumer, MonitoringListener, ScanServiceConsumer, WiBeatMonitoringListener

    public class AdvertisingNotificationManager
extends BroadcastReceiver
implements BackgroundScanServiceConsumer, MonitoringListener, WiBeatMonitoringListener
    Allows to show notifications when user enter region, which is defined on CMS.

    Note: The AdvertisingNotificationManager uses a BackgroundScanManager to detect region events. Also uses SDKCmsClient to interact with Leantegra CMS API.

    Usage: 
      public class MyApplication extends Application implements AdvertisingNotificationManager.AdvertisingNotificationManagerListener{

      private AdvertisingNotificationManager mBackgroundManager;
      @Override
      public void onCreate() {
          super.onCreate();
          //Initialize SDK
          LeantegraSDK.initialize(getApplicationContext());
          //Create content Intent
          Intent intent = new Intent(getBaseContext(), MainActivity.class);
          //Create notification builder
          Notification.Builder builder = new Notification.Builder(this)
                  .setSmallIcon(android.R.drawable.ic_dialog_info)
                  .setContentTitle("Title")
                  .setSound(RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_NOTIFICATION));
          //Initialize manager
          mManager = new AdvertisingNotificationManager(getApplicationContext(), intent, builder, this);
      }
      @Override
      public void onError(ScanError scanError) {
          //Handle error
      }
 }
    Since:
    1.1.0
    See Also:
    BackgroundScanManager

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdvertisingNotificationManager

        public AdvertisingNotificationManager(Context context,
                                      Intent contentIntent,
                                      Notification.Builder notificationBuilder,
                                      AdvertisingNotificationManager.AdvertisingNotificationManagerListener listener)
        Constructs monitoring with the background scan in your Application and shown notifications. Notification displayed when the user entered the region and it has a content on the server.

        Note: Notification content loaded from Leantegra CMS, therefore you must initialize SDK.

        Note: The content Intent will be added extended data. Extended data is a CMSRule object, what you can get with RULE_KEY key. The CMSRule object can used to get advertising content of the notification.

        Note: The title, content intent and auto cancel parameters of Notification.Builder will be set in manager. All other parameters you must set manually.

        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        contentIntent - Intent what be sent when the notification is clicked
        notificationBuilder - builder what be used to show notifications
        listener - used to deliver scan error

      • startScan

        public void startScan()
        Start scanning BLE devices.

        Note: Scan will be started automatically after binding with scan service.

        Warning: Scan will be started for all instances of ScanServiceManager.

      • stopScan

        public void stopScan()
        Stop scanning BLE devices.

        Warning: Scan will be stopped for all instances of ScanServiceManager, and it will be started manually.
